extendedInfo.description: Keep up with Thoroughbred racing when youâre on the go with the free Today's RacingTM app from Equibase Company - Thoroughbred racingâs official source for racing information and statistics.Need to know when your favorite track is running? Or catch the replay of a race you just missed? The Todayâs Racing app brings it all to your fingertips - entries, changes, results, replays and handicapping products â for every North American Thoroughbred track!  By presenting a rolling two days of entries and results information, youâll never miss out on playing your favorite track.FeaturesResults Charts with Replays â Get current day and the previous dayâs results for every race, including links to replays!  Result charts offer a comprehensive recap of the entire race, including complete order of finish, descriptive narrative for each horse, odds, payoff information and more.At-a-Glance Result Information âSee the first, second and third-place finishers for every race with payoff information and a complete order of finish.Entries -Get current and next dayâs entries for every race from every track. Each entry contains detailed race information, post time, post position, morning line odds, and more. Convenient links to handicapping products are also provided to ensure you will be ready to make an informed wager from where ever you are!Changes - Be the first to know about scratches and changes, plus get access to the current weather conditions at the track.Racing Schedule - Check out the complete listing of every trackâs opening and closing dates and easily find out when your favorite track is scheduled to either start or end itâs live racing meet.Purchase is required for replays and handicapping products.

reviews.title: Good app for tracking race times and results.
reviews.comment: The one option I wish it had was an option to get notified when a race results was posted. Similar to other sports apps and notifications for score changes/EOQ/etc.  Would be 5 starts with this option.
reviews.author: Bill Eichorst

reviews.title: Best app
reviews.comment: Best app ever!!
reviews.author: Juana Hernandez

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Not enough info of the house in there last races
reviews.author: Mark O Brien

reviews.title: no good enough without UK racing information
reviews.comment: just US racing form only ? if with UK racing form i would give it 5 star.
reviews.author: Jack Low

reviews.title: Great racing form app
reviews.comment: I wish it provided the times for the horses past races like the $5 form you get at the stands. I wouldn\'t even mind having to buy the form for that day via the app.
reviews.author: Brad Kriss

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: LOVE IT NOW U CAN SEE CARRYOVERS.. WISH U COULD SEE PP\'S ON IT THOUGH
reviews.author: Doug Casso

reviews.title: Useful tool for bettors.
reviews.comment: This is a very useful app if you bet and keep up with horse racing.
reviews.author: Michael Bartolome

reviews.title: Dwain Chambers
reviews.comment: Needs three days. But it is good.

reviews.comment: I love this app  ! ! Very nice ! !

reviews.title: Good but flawed

reviews.title: Money maker!
reviews.comment: Nothing beats seeing the suckers at the track buying a program while I count my winnings cause I used this free app!
